Posts.Content: Nov 11, 2007 10:24PM sarahL wrote: I am interested in what all you women think of a new product for women who have undergone a mastectomy and are unable to wear low cut necklines....what if you could buy a fabric insert that you could add to all your clothing...like bras, shirts, dresses and even bathing suits....it would be for v-neck like clothing.Â  Do you think that this would help/solve your clothing problems?...this would be something that easily attaches without having to sew it in? Would love to hear all comments...thanks so much...
